short_summary: Adipose fin clipping of juvenile salmonids at Conuma Hatchery
duration_in_months: My observations indicate that the duration of the contract is approximately 12 months as inferred from the expected contract start date (2023-12-22) and end date (2024-12-31).
full_summary:
-------------------------------

**Salmonid Adipose Fin Clipping at Conuma Hatchery**

**Tender Notice ID:** CB-109-64939602

**Government Agency:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Brief Overview:**
------------------------

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) invites qualified suppliers to bid on a contract for the adipose fin clipping of juvenile chinook salmon at Conuma Hatchery located on the West Coast of Vancouver Island. The contract includes an estimated 3.8 million juvenile chinook salmon to be clipped between late February to late May each year.

**Objective:**
--------------

The objective of this contract is to complete the adipose fin clipping of juvenile chinook salmon at Conuma Hatchery to facilitate the fish marking program. This program aims to provide essential information for fisheries management, including harvest identification, total catch estimation, and international management modeling.

**Contract Details:**
----------------------

*   **Contract Period:**
    *   Anticipated start date: December 22, 2023
    *   Anticipated end date: December 31, 2024
    *   Two additional one-year renewal periods are planned
*   **Location:**
    *   Conuma Hatchery, West Coast of Vancouver Island, between Gold River and Tahsis
*   **Fin clipping Program:**
    *   Approximately 3.8 million juvenile chinook salmon to be clipped annually
*   **Security Requirement:**
    *   None
*   **Inquiries:**
    *   Submit inquiries to the Contracting Authority
    *   Bidders are advised that Canadabuys.canada.ca is not responsible for distribution of solicitation documents

**RFP Documents:**
---------------------

The tender package, including the RFP document, can be accessed at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files(webform/tender\_notice/25650/30004714---rfp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/25650/30004714---rfp.pdf)]

**Deadline:**
--------------

The tender exclusion date and time is December 11, 2023, 14:00:00. Late submissions will not be accepted. Martin J. Makus would be happy to assist with further queries. Please address all inquiries to: martin.j.makus@canada.ca

Announced
